column1: Kathy and I want to wish each of you a Happy Thanksgiving. Despite this challenging year we have so much to be thankful for. I’m grateful to live in this beautiful free county and for my loving family.  #givethanks https://t.co/QagalJQI9F
A tradition unlike any other #themasters https://t.co/xAyFYszM44
The loss of these 5 American soldiers is a tragedy. Our hearts go out to the families as we pray for a successful recovery for the remaining US solider. https://t.co/9wN3CyUs3r

Happy Birthday to the @USMC 245 yrs of sacrifice and service!  Join me in thanking Marines past present and future.    #Marines #SemperFi https://t.co/l4Lt1fkS3J

I appreciate that she could disagree with her colleagues and yet still respect them forming lasting friendships like the one she and the late Justice Scalia shared.   Our thoughts and prayers go out to her family during this difficult time.

Kathy and I join a mourning nation with the loss of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg. She leaves a legacy of countless accomplishments and will be remembered for her relentless support for women’s equality. There is no doubt she was an icon in our justice system.
